TextLines: <color=yellow> SolidRusT Networks NOLAG™ game hosting. </color>
- 5x Resource Gather and customized loot tables
- Raidable NPC bases and Crate Hunting events
- Faster smelting, auto-sort loot in boxes
- Auto-use Fuel and Wood from Tool Cupboard
- Useful CCTV Utilities, motion sensors and Dancing emotes
- Modular Vehicle lifts and Reclyclers at monuments
- Locks, Storage, Extra Seats and Turrets on Modular Vehicles
- Improved recycling, recycle anything!
- Better stack sizes, World Bank and Backpacks
- Base repair and auto upgrade tools
- Escalated Bradley APC combat levels
- Constant Hackable Crate and Treasure events
- Blueprint Sharing and Better Box Sorting
- Parachute for jumping off high places
- Clans Tools, Team Chats and Rust+ Mobile App enabled
- NPC Vendors, Safe Zones, night creeps and server votes.
- Real-time Hit and Damage indicators, Realistic Explosions
- Improved Weather and heath effects
<color=yellow>1</color> - All 3X 5X 10X (Solo/Duo/Trio) have a max group limit of 3 players
<color=yellow>2</color> - No admins, moderators or any other human will censor chat (just bots).
<color=yellow>3</color> - use the in-game chat censor/filter to block unwanted content on your own
<color=yellow>4</color> - Do not call out hackers in chat, report them using <color=yellow> F7</color>.
<color=yellow>5</color> - No cheating, scripting, bug abuse or otherwise exploiting the game.
<color=yellow>6</color> - Griefing / PvP / Raids / Base Takovers is allowed and encouraged.
<color=yellow> /airstrike </color>     - Convert supply signal into an airstrike
<color=yellow> /ad </color>            - Auto-close doors after opening them
<color=yellow> /al </color>            - Auto-lock doors with a specific code
<color=yellow> /autoauthui </color>    - Auto-add friends / clan / team to Tool Cupboard
<color=yellow> /backpack </color>      - Open your backpack storage
<color=yellow> /backpackGUI </color>   - Toggle on/off the Backpack icon
<color=yellow> /bank </color>          - Opens the Central Bank storage
<color=yellow> /bgrade </color>        - Set the default Resource Grade when building
<color=yellow> /br </color>            - Building repair using the Hammer tool
<color=yellow> /bs </color>            - Blueprint Sharing settings
<color=yellow> /carturret </color>     - Add auto-turrets to a modular car
<color=yellow> /cctv </color>          - CCTV Security Camera tools
<color=yellow> /chute </color>         - Parachute for landing soft from high places
<color=yellow> /claim </color>         - Claim donation code
<color=yellow> /clanhelp </color>      - Clan management commands
<color=yellow> /cnv </color>           - Chill Night Vision add-on
<color=yellow> /dance </color>         - Dancing emote
<color=yellow> /dc </color>            - Discord Connect - get the SURVIVOR role and free kits
<color=yellow> /deaths </color>        - Show last death locations
<color=yellow> /down </color>          - Downgrade Structures
<color=yellow> /downall </color>       - Downgrade Whole Base
<color=yellow> /drone </color>         - Get a Drone
<color=yellow> /farmtools </color>     - Manage farming, clones, ect..
<color=yellow> /fmini </color>         - Fetch MiniCopter
<color=yellow> /friend </color>        - Manage Friends list
<color=yellow> /fs </color>            - Furnace stack splitter settings
<color=yellow> /gather </color>        - Show current Gathering multiplyers
<color=yellow> /heal </color>          - Heal yourself
<color=yellow> /healplayer </color>    - Heal another player
<color=yellow> /hit </color>           - disable/enable hit markers
<color=yellow> /home </color>          - Set your Home spawn points
<color=yellow> /info </color>          - Show this info / help panel
<color=yellow> /inspect </color>       - Show details on held item
<color=yellow> /kit </color>           - Spawn item and loadout kits
<color=yellow> /mymini </color>        - Spawn MiniCopter
<color=yellow> /nomini </color>        - Remove MiniCopter
<color=yellow> /phone </color>         - Telephone settings
<color=yellow> /pm </color>            - Private messages
<color=yellow> /pmhistory </color>     - Private Message History
<color=yellow> /qs help </color>       - Quickly sort into boxes, and loot at once.
<color=yellow> /r </color>             - Reply to last private message
<color=yellow> /raidalarm </color>     - Rust+ App settings for Raid alarms
<color=yellow> /remove </color>        - Remover Tool for owned structures
<color=yellow> /setgenes </color>      - Set the genes for the seed you are holding
<color=yellow> /sil </color>           - Add a JPG image URL to a sign
<color=yellow> /silrestore </color>    - Restore JPG image after Rust Updates
<color=yellow> /silt </color>          - Add text to a sign
<color=yellow> /showsphere </color>    - Show how far your TC(s) can reach
<color=yellow> /showsphereall</color>  - Show All Players how far your TC(s) can reach
<color=yellow> /skin </color>          - Free Steam Workshop skins
<color=yellow> /skulls </color>        - Show how many human skulls you have crushed
<color=yellow> /sl </color>            - Security Light configuration
<color=yellow> /time </color>          - Show current world time
<color=yellow> /tod </color>           - Show Time of Day statistics
<color=yellow> /tpa </color>           - Accept a teleport request
<color=yellow> /tpb </color>           - Teleport back to where you previously teleported from
<color=yellow> /tpr </color>           - Request teleport to another player
<color=yellow> /trade </color>         - Remote trading with other players
<color=yellow> /up </color>            - Upgrade structures
<color=yellow> /upall </color>         - Upgrade Whole Base
To enable Key Binds, so you don't have to use the chat commands,
Open the <color=yellow> F1 </color> client console, Customize the key you want to bind
(suggested examples below), pressing enter after each line
<color=yellow> bind b teamping </color> - Ping what you're looking at, to your team
<color=yellow> bind h heal </color> - Heal yourself
<color=yellow> bind k kill </color> - Kill yourself
<color=yellow> bind c chute </color> - Open Parachute
<color=yellow> bind f2 ''consoletoggle;combatlog'' </color> - open combat log with <color=yellow> F2 </color> key
<color=yellow> bind Mouse1 +lighttoggle;+attack2 </color> - turn on weapon light, when aiming down sights
Each SRT Rank will give you a unique spawn kit, grant bank and backpack space and many other quality of life improvements.
<color=silver> Scavenger </color>    - Default rank for unregistered players and guests.
<color=white> Survivor </color>      - Registered player. can be obtained using <color=yellow> /dc </color> command
<color=green> SolidPlayer </color>   - Verified player. Have connected their steam accounts to <color=orange> solidrust.net </color>
<color=aqua> Supporter </color>      - Contributing Member. Have made a donation, or contributed time to the NOLAG™ network
<color=purple> Legendary </color>    - Team Member. Monthly subscriber or NOLAG™ Staff member.
<color=yellow> Roles are global throughout all NOLAG™ servers and Discord. Rewards are server specific. </color>
See: <color=orange> solidrust.net/rewards </color> for more details on server rewards.
See: <color=orange> discord.gg/PpAvPcD46q </color> for community support, Rust news and server updates
